name: Full SaaS Product
description: Complete SaaS application â€” frontend, backend, infrastructure, and product management

defaultDirectives.dev: Build production-quality features with tests. Follow the architecture patterns defined by the architect.
defaultDirectives.architect: Design the full system architecture: frontend, backend, infrastructure. Document decisions in ADRs.
defaultDirectives.devops: Manage CI/CD, infrastructure as code, monitoring, alerting, and deployment strategies.
defaultDirectives.qa: Comprehensive testing strategy: unit, integration, e2e. Track quality metrics and regressions.
defaultDirectives.data-engineer: Design and maintain data layer: schemas, migrations, analytics pipelines, caching strategies.
defaultDirectives.analyst: Market research, competitor analysis, user research synthesis. Feed insights to PM and PO.
defaultDirectives.pm: Define product roadmap, prioritize features, write user stories with clear acceptance criteria.
defaultDirectives.po: Validate deliverables against business requirements. Approve or reject with clear feedback.
defaultDirectives.sm: Facilitate sprint ceremonies, remove blockers, track velocity and team health metrics.
defaultDirectives.ux-design-expert: Design user flows, wireframes, and UI specifications. Ensure consistency and accessibility.
defaultDirectives.aios-master: Coordinate multi-agent workflows, optimize agent interactions, resolve conflicts.
defaultDirectives.squad-creator: Dynamically assemble and disband agent squads based on task requirements.
